Posts.Content: ajzjmsmom wrote: I was wondering if one of you wonderful women could give me some information.  My 61 yr old Mother was diagnosed Oct 2 '08 with IDC she was ER and PR positive and Her-2 neg.  On Oct 14 she had a mastectomey and will not have reconstruction.  The final path report showed no lymph node involvement and since they had already done a lumpectomey the end of Sept there were no signs of cancer in the final report.  Her surgeon told her she would probably only have to take hormone therapy.  Fast forward to today, her first appointment with her oncologist.  She is recommending CMF for 6 rounds and then 10 yrs of hormone therapy.  Anyone have any experience with this and side effects.  I live far away from my Mom and unable to be there but I want to be informed so I can at least know what she is going through and be able to maybe help her emotionally.  Log in to post a reply
